prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a sturdy body and powerful arms.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a boulder but has a mischievous smile.
Generate a Pokemon that can blend in with rocky terrain and has a strong defense.
Make a rugged-looking Pokemon with a gray color scheme and an athletic build.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in caves and has the ability to lift heavy rocks.
Design a Pokemon that has a rocky exterior and can withstand tough battles.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a stone with arms and a playful personality.

distinctive_features: Facial features with a determined expression
